settings.text:
ABOUT


Sourodip has been debating since a very young age and have a lot experience in competitive debating. Sourodip has risen to the highest ranks in international competitive debating. Sourodip believe that each participant must learn to get out of their comfort zone and harness their personal values, passions, and skills to custom design a career path as unique as they are. Sourodip believe that the skills needed to be truly great at debate can be learned, practiced, and that anyone, even those not naturally eloquent, can become a great debater.

DEBATING EXPERIENCE


Worlds Quarter Finalist, 2020

Australs Champion, 2020

Worlds Quarter Finalist, 2018
